channel.title: Gamertag Radio The Union of Music and Gaming - Xbox 360, PS3 and Wii
channel.description: Gamertag Radio The Union of Music and Gaming - Xbox 360, PS3 and Wii Xbox Live & Xbox 360 Community Radio. Get the lastest Xbox & Xbox 360, Playstation 3, PS2, Nintendo, DS, news, reviews, interviews and much more. Hosted by Godfree, Paustin, Ladyluck and PETEROCC. Voicemail: 786-273-7GTR

item.title: Episode #340 - Pre-E3 '12 Call of Duty Black Ops II Impressions
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

  • New website design

  • Call of Duty Black Ops II Preview

  • Games delayed - Bioshock Infinite, South Park, Aliens: Colonial Marines, DmC: Devil May Cry and XCOM

  • Dragon's Lair Kinect review

  • Ghost Recon Future Solider review

  • Fan questions (a voicemail from Venezuela!)

  • Custom Soundtrack of the week: Slum Village Ft Skyzoo & Focus-Church (Remix)

  • Support Godfree’s new show for Discovery Channel: http://yosoydannypena.com or http://eusoudannypena.com.br

item.title: Episode #339 - Spec Ops The Line Interview
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

  • Someone has finished Diablo III - Level 32 Barbarian Yoshichan posted his final game statistics on NeoGAF, having finished the action role-player on the Normal difficulty setting in 12 hours and 29 minutes.

  • Activision pays $42m to former Infinity Ward devs, not a settlement

  • Interview: Spec Ops The Line

  • Diablo III tips by Ladyluck (Unreleased)

  • Support Godfree’s new show for Discovery Channel: http://yosoydannypena.com or http://eusoudannypena.com.br
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com (Godfree)

item.title: Episode #333 - Borderlands 2 Interview, Developers say Wii U is less powerful than Xbox 360, PS3 & Hot 97 FM Roundtable
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

Miami Hurricon Event on April 7th! University of Miami1251 Memorial Drive, Coral Gables, FL. Starts at 12PM - 7PM Entrance fee: FREE of charge!: Gamertag Radio Panel: Meet Peter and Alicia Toledo! Peter Toledo is one of the voices behind Gamertag Radio, and Alicia Toledo is the former host of the Sarcastic Gamer Pink Podcast. No question about video games will be left unanswered! Enjoy this exciting question and answer session with two of the minds behind Gamertag Radio and Extra Life!
Developers say Wii U is less powerful than Xbox 360, PS3
Star Wars Kinect - I'm Han Solo
Custom Soundtrack of the week: Diamond D – Deflate Cha
Interview with Kevin Duc, concept artist on Borderlands 2
Hot 97 FM ROundtable feat. Soldier X (TAG) and TAT Wza (IFWT)
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com (Godfree)

item.title: Episode #264 - Disney Epic Mickey Panel
item.description:
Explore the power of the brush like never before as Warren Spector (Creative Director Junction Point - Disney Interactive Studios) unveils a new glimpse into the Disney Epic Mickey video game world of Wasteland and its forgotten cartoon star, Oswald the Lucky Rabbit. Joining him - Peter David (award winning comic writer) who will discuss the Disney Epic Mickey Digicomic, along with Disney Epic Mickey graphic novel.

Enjoy this great panel live from NY Comic Con 2010.

item.title: Episode #257 - Mafia II Community Launch Party NYC
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

Special show this week. Live from the Mafia II Community Launch party in NYC featuring Playboy's own Jo Garcia, Miss Info of Hot 97 & Mayday.

Also Gamertag Radio celebrates 2 million downloads!

"Wizzard Media would like to congratulate Gamertag Radio for reaching the 2 Million Download mark. This level of downloads places the Gamertag Radio show in very exclusive company and shows a great deal of audience approval of the excellent content they are producing. Wizzard Media is very proud to host Gamertag Radio and again we offer our congratulations on reaching this milestone." Rob Walch - VP Podcaster Relations, Wizzard Media / Libsyn

item.title: Gamertag Radio & 2K Games Presents: Mafia II Community Launch Party! FREE Event
item.description:
Grab your fedoras and pin stripe suits for Gamertag Radio’s Official Mafia II Community Launch Events in Miami and New York in August. Gamertag Radio (GTR) is excited to partner once again with 2K Games for the official Mafia II Community Launch Events, sponsored by Sony Playstation 3, Playboy, Scion, Game Juice, C.H.P. and more.


Starting August 22, 2010 Gamertag Radio will be partying it up in Miami at Grand Central (www.grandcentralmiami.com) along with DJ Sharpsound (www.freshbasilcrew.com) and live performances by Garcia (www.crazyhood.com) and ¡MAYDAY! (www.maydayonline.com). For a chance to check out the game, there will be Xbox 360’s and Sony Playstation 3’s on hand for attendees along with giveaways and more.


Special guest Miss Info from Hot97 (NYC) will be co-hosting the event along with GTR’s own Godfree and Peterocc. Doors open at 8pm. It's an Open Bar for the 1st 200 people at the door. Pre-Order Mafia II and present a valid receipt at the door to skip the line!


The party continues on August 28th, as GTR brings the party to Bronx to celebrate the launch with Miss Info and special guest Playboy’s Jo Garcia (http://www.playboy.com/gamernextdoor). Expect the same treatment up north as down south with giveaways, open bar for the 1st 200 attendees and the opportunity to skip to the front of the line with your receipt of a Mafia II pre-order.


Also, for those of you that can’t make it to Miami or NY, SFX-360 (www.sfx-360.com) will also be hosting an official Mafia II Community Launch Event in Chicago on August 21st.

For more information on the 2K Games Mafia II Community Launch Events, go to www.gamertagradio.com!


Date: August 22, 2010 | 8pm - 12/1am
Where: Grand Central | 697 N Miami Ave, Miami, FL 33136 | 305 377 2277
What: Mafia II Community Launch Party

Sponsors: 2K Games, Gamertag Radio, Sony, CHP, Scion, nVidia, Playboy, Game Juice & Gamebreakers


Details: Co-Hosted by Miss Info from Hot97 (NYC), Gamertag Radio presents Mafia II by 2K Games Official Launch Party! With live performances by Miami's underground king, Garcia and Mayday with support from DJ Sharpsound.


Date: August 28, 2010 | 8pm - 12am
Where: 865 E 135 Street Bronx, NY
What: Mafia II Community Launch Party

Sponsors: 2K Games, Gamertag Radio, Crazy Hood Productions, Scion, nVidia, Playboy, Sony, & Game Juice


Details: Special Guest: Playboy's Gamer Next Door Jo Garcia, Co-Hosted by Miss Info from Hot97 (NYC), Gamertag Radio presents Mafia II by 2K Games Official Launch Party! Live performances by Miami's ownMayday. Music by DJ Sharpsound.
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com (Godfree)

item.title: Episode 226: Community Vibes 5 Live
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

Gamertag Radio's 5th Anniversary celebration; Community Vibes 5. Presented by Bioshock 2 (2K Games) and The Misadventures of P.B. Winterbottom (2K Play).

Live performances:

* Artofficial
* Garcia
* ¡MAYDAY!


Thanks to: 2K Games, 2K Games, Ecco Lounge, SFX360, Game Wars, Infinite Bits, Gamebreakers, Crazy Hood, Shady Tees, Public Wizard, EA Sports, Sega, THQ, Namco, Microsoft, HP, Konsole Kingz, Zune, Xbox, Neversoft, and the fans for supporting all these years. Until next year!



Media Buzz

* The Miami New Times rated Community Vibes 5 the #1 Super Bowl event in South Florida.
* EA Sports Community Team - Raczilla: "Community Vibes 5 was one of the best gaming events I've ever attended."
* HipHopgamer - "Community Vibes 5 was legendary everyone, you cannot miss next years".
* Analog Hype - "Community Vibes - Its the best gaming party we here at AnalogHype has ever attended."
* Unscripted 360 - "I can guarantee you’ll be in for a good time!"
* Destructoid - "Miami people: Screw the Superbowl, go to Community Vibes 5 instead!"
* GamingAngels - "Gamertag Radio might be hosting the best party outside of the Superbowl in Miami."
* Gamingbits.com - "I've attended Community Vibes 3 & 4, and you bet I'm looking forward to attending Community Vibes 5"
* TheKoalition - "Godfree of GTR has been working day & night on this event. If you go, it will be well worth it."
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com (Godfree)

item.title: WGTR Baggins FM Vol. 2 - Wrekonize & DJ Idee Hip Hop Show
item.description:
As the world awaits the next wild addition to the Grand Theft Auto IV world, Gamertag Radio, a gaming and hip-hop site is already prepared to take on the newest element to the GTA world. With GTA: The Ballad of Gay Tony, you'll see the opening of a new pirate station in Liberty City, WGTR Baggins FM, for your enjoyment. Be ready as the station hosts some dope tracks to make your gameplay in The Ballad of Gay Tony more authentic. Let these be your custom soundtrack as you own the most recent expansion to the streets of Liberty City.
Check out the music as GTR staff member Peterocc throws down his own commercial free mix show. Wrekonize and DJ Idee collaborating together have created a sweet hip hop show for your listening pleasure. WGTR will be up and running at the same time you are, with two distinct and different mixes available for download, as well as an exclusive and brand new track from popular Miami hip-hop artist MayDay. Put them onto your Xbox 360 as a custom soundtrack and enjoy.
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #205 - Shadow Complex Podcast Interview with Chair Entertainment
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

* Podcast interview with Chair Entertainment about their new game Shadow Complex for the Xbox Live Arcade.
* Shadow Complex review: "This is the Super Metroid Of 2009 for Xbox Live Arcade. Taking the 2D/3D genre to a whole new level!".
* GTR Roundtable: Summer Of Arcade 2009 discussion. Most of these games for 15 bucks are way better than the retail games that been coming out this year. Also which music game will sale more this year Guitar Hero 5 or The Beatles Rock Band?


All this and more only on GTR!

item.title: Episode #204 - Games On Demand Debate
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

* Staff members Godfree & Peterocc and special guest JVB recorded a roundtable discussion about the new Xbox 360 dashboard update. The gaming community are having a huge debate about "Games On Demand". Games are too expensive via the marketplace but cheaper in retail stores. Find out what GTR staff had to say about this debate.
* Podcast interview with upcoming artist XV about his song Mirrors Edge & mixtape.
* What makes you a hardcore gamer? Peterocc seems a bit confused and says he isn't hardcore gamer. Godfree disagrees and says why.


All this and more on GTR!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Charles Hamilton - "Rosado"

item.title: Episode #194 - E3 2009 Roundtable & Carlos Ferro Interview
item.description:
The last show before GTR's big E3 2009 coverage happening June 1st - 4th. This week the Gamertag Radio staff had a roundtable discussion about which company will win this year at E309. Also gave our predictions on what might happen at the press conferences. Could Microsoft come back on top again? Can Sony surprise everyone with huge announcements at E3? Will Nintendo present something for the hardcore gamers cough *Zelda*cough?

Also during this year's GameNarp. Godfree & Ladyluck recorded an interview with voice actor Carlos Ferro. He has been in many games from Gears Of War, Saints Row, James Bond 007: Everything or Nothing, Tony Hawk's American Wasteland), Assassin's Creed, Godfather II & more. Carlos also gave us a hint about his next game that will be announce at E3. Can you guess which game it is?

All this and more only on GTR!

They give us the scoop about the new maps & zomebie mode. All this and more only on Gamertag Radio!

item.title: Episode #192 - UFC 2009 Undisputed & Wolverine Interviews
item.description:
This week the GTR staff invites Lono to talk about his brand new podcast called "Respawn Radio", plus about podcasting and much more. Also interviews with THQ: They gave us the 411 about their new game UFC 2009 Undisputed & Raven Software about X-Men Origins: Wolverine Video Game.

Staff member Peterocc gives us more details about Army Of Two The 40th Day & find out why Paustin doesn't like Velvet Assassin for the Xbox 360. All this & more only on Gamertag Radio!

item.title: Episode #191 - Exclusive Podcast Interview about Space Invaders Extreme
item.description:
This week GTR has an exclusive podcast interview with Arvin Bautista. The Senior artist on Space Invaders Extreme for the Xbox Live Arcade. He gave us the scoop on the release date, new features only for XBL Arcade, and much more.

To celebrate the release of the game Gamertag Radio will be having an official Space Invaders Extreme Tournament. The top 3 gamers will win a SIE limited edition print and accompanying certificate of authenticity. There's only 180 copies made in the word each hand signed by Tomohiro Nishikado, the creator of the original Space Invader video game. The official press release is coming out this week. Stay tuned!


Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Kurious George feat. MC Serch - "Benneton"

item.title: Episode #190 - The Road Trip Edition & Army Of Two 40th Day Coverage
item.description:
The GTR staff are taking this week off from recording but everyone manage to record on this episode called "The Road Trip Edition".

The first group record a podcast during the ride to Orlando, FL and had a discussion about E3 2009. While Peterocc record a roundtalbe discussion live from Montreal, Canada about Army of Two The 40th Day feat DeaconBlade from Unscripted 360 and David Seeney from Konsole Kingz.

Also posted an audio from a couple weeks ago of Godfree as a special guest on Sirius Radio - Shade 45 to talk about video games and Resident Evil 5 (PS3 & Xbox 360). Enjoy the show!

item.title: Episode #189 - Jadakiss Podcast Interview
item.description:
This week GTR brings you an interview with Def Jam recording artist Jadakiss. He talks about his new album "The Last Kiss", about the new album with the Lox coming out this Summer & what's his favorite basketball game NBA Live 09 or NBA 2k9.

Twitter Question Of The Week: Does putting unlockable achievements on a game make a good marketing strategy? ie Halo 3 Mythic Map Pack w/ODST Achievements.

Exclusive Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Classic freestyle that took place a couple of years ago during Zulu Nation 30th Anniversary party feat. Lord Finesse, Fat Joe, P-Doe, Jeru & KRS ONE. Live at club SOBs.

All this and more only on Gamertag Radio!

item.title: Episode #188 - Soulja Boy EXCLUSIVE Podcast Interview
item.description:
Gamertag Radio recorded an exclusive podcast interview with music artist Soulja Boy a few days ago. This is a very different interview. He talks about the love he has for gaming, his dream to attend E3 2009, which games he doesn't like, working on his own video game, why he only plays Xbox 360 and much more. Also coming soon GTR vs his crew on Xbox Live!

Enjoy this episode and make sure to spread the word about the new show.

item.title: Episode #187 - The Chronicles of Riddick: Assault on Dark Athena Interview
item.description:
This week the Gamertag Radio staff had a huge debate about Modern Warfare 2 VS Halo 3:ODST. This all started last night during the recording of the show while posting the new GTR Twitter Question of the week:
Quote:
Do you think Modern Warfare 2 will affect games like Halo 3:ODST and current main FPS titles?
Listen to the show and give us your feedback about this debate. Also we have an interview with Starbreeze Studios the developers of The Chronicles of Riddick: Assault on Dark Athena for the Xbox 360, PS3 & PC. Enjoy the new show!

Custom Soundtrack of The Week: Saigon - Goodbye (Produced By Statik Selektah)

item.title: Episode #186 - Guitar Hero: Metallica Interview with Neversoft
item.description:
This week the Gamertag Radio staff interviews Neversoft about Guitar Hero: Metallica for all consoles.

Twitter question of the week: Are you excited about the announcement of Max Payne 3? Do you think Rockstar can do the series justice?

Make sure to follow the GTR staff members on Twitter: Gamertagradio, Godfree, Miss Irie, Peterocc, Paustinj, Ladyluck34, BakedAnt, & Tr3ks

The staff members had a short roundtable about gaming companies stepping up with the community and some been dead when it comes to that. Find out what the crew had to say about this topic. All this and more only on GTR!

item.title: Episode #183 - WCG Ultimate Gamer Roundtable & Street Fighter The Movie Review
item.description:
Ever since the GTR staff posted the video promo of WCG Ultimate Gamer there have been mix opinions about the show. This week staff members Godfree, Miss Irie, Peterocc, Paustinj & Ladyluck recorded a roundtable discussion about it. Find out what they had to say about this "reality" show. The good, the bad & the ugly. WCG Ultimate Gamer show premiers next week: March 10 @ 10pm EST on SCI-FI Channel. Click here for more information.

What's up with Paustinj wasting money on the new Street Fighter: The Legend of Chun-Li movie. He gives us his review and why the first Street Fighter movie was better. All this & more only on GTR!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Rapper Big Pooh - "Radio"

item.title: Episode #182 - Live From Community Vibes IV
item.description:
Gamertag Radio made history once again with Community Vibes IV. Many sites from the gaming community was also part of this event: SFX-360.com, Destructoid.com, R3ysGameday.com & Infinite Bits. Also a big shout out to the main sponsor of the event TRITTON Technologies and the owners of Club Ecco. This year we had the chance to record live from the 4th year anniversary party celebrating GTR's B-Day. The crowd screaming for the free goodies & live performances from Mayday & Garcia.

Download the latest podcast episode and find out why this was one of the biggest events we ever made.

item.title: Episode #181 - Getting Ready For Community Vibes IV & Miss Info Interview
item.description:
The Gamertag Radio staff are getting ready for the biggest gaming party ever in Miami, FL. Find out the latest updates about Community Vibes IV and what some of the fans had to say via twitter about the party. Also an exclusive podcast interview with Miss Info from Hot 97 live from The Grand Theft Auto IV The Lost & Damned hands on event in New York City. She had a few things to say about gaming, music industry, is she a journalist or blogger and what's up with the whole Chris Brown and Rihanna beef?

All this and more only on GTR!

item.title: Episode #180 - Exclusive Podcast Interview with The ESA About E3 2009
item.description:
The new E3 2009 is coming from June 2nd - 4th. But what are the biggest changes the ESA are doing to make this year's better then the last 3 events? Find out in thier first podcast interview with Gamertag Radio. This week Rich Taylor, the senior vice president of communications and research joins us and give us al the scoop about E3 2009.

Also JVB gives us a review of 3-On-3 NHL Arcade for the PSN & Xbox Live Arcade. The GTR staff give us more information about Community Vibes IV, Godfree is live in New York City for a Grand Theft Auto IV The Lost & Damned DLC private event & more more. All this and more only on GTR!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Termanalogy - "Here In Liberty City [Explicit]" & Talib Kweli - "My Favorite Song [Explicit]" both from the new GTAIV The Lost & Damned EP. Enjoy!

Are you ready for Community Vibes IV? The staff can't stop talking about one of the biggest community events of the year in Miami, FL. This week we bring you a brand new GTR intro produced by Peterocc (props!). An interview with EA about their upcoming game "3-On-3 NHL Arcade" coming this month for the Xbox Live Arcade & PSN.

item.description:
This week some of the GTR staff got together to record the last roundtable for this year. Topics from favorite games of the year, crappy games, sleepers & more. Enjoy the last show for 2008. Happy New Year to all!

I also added some of the best highlights of the year for GTR at the end of the show.

item.title: Episode #170 - Live Show @ GameNarp in Miami, FL
item.description:
The first official Destructoid Miami NARP featuring Gamertag Radio & SFX360. The event took place at FIU with hundred of gamers from the state of Florida. The staff got together to recorded a live show during the party. The crowd goes crazy with tons of giveaways. FREE copes of Sacred 2 (PC), Smackdown vs Raw 2009 (Xbox 360, PS3, DS, & Will), Red Alert 3 (Xbox 360), Comic books & more.

Interviews with Neiro from Destructoid, SFX360, R3ys Gameday, GameWars & more. Enjoy this classic show! Also GTR made an official announcement live during the event. Destructoid joins the Gamercast Network!

item.title: Episode #169 - Big Pooh from Little Brother interview & Feelz Good Last Show
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio Episode #169 don't miss an exclusive podcast interview with Big Pooh member of the Hip Hop group Little Brother. He talks about the love of gaming, being part of the NBA 2k6 soundtrack and much more.

Also one of our staff member record's his last show for GTR. Feelz Good is leaving the show and he explains why on Ep 169. Plus you know he can't leave without leaving some controversy.

Only on GTR! Enjoy!

item.title: Episode #168 - Gears Of War 2 Midnight Launch Nationwide Coverage
item.description:
Finally the all new Gears Of War 2 in stores nationwide! Last night the GTR staff had a nationwide coverage with the help from some of our listeners in Miami, Maryland, Chicago, and other locations. Find out what happen behind the scenes during the midnight launch event. Also an interview with Mike Capps The President of Epic Games. He gave us the scoop about GOW2 & much more.

Win A Zune Gears of War 2 Special Edition 120GB

To celebrate the release of Gears Of War 2 we are giving away a brand new Zune Gears of War 2 Special Edition 120GB to a lucky listener. All you have to do is download the episode and give us your feedback about it on this thread. That's not all we are also going to give out codes to unlock Golden Weapons in the game to 6 lucky winners. Unlock the Golden Lancer or Hammerburst.

Enjoy the new show & good luck to all!

item.title: Episode #166 - Mirror's Edge Interview
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

* Interview with EA about Mirror's Edge for the Xbox 360 & PS3. Unreleased interview from PAX08.
* The GTR staff talks about the new E3 2009. Now open to the publc "Tokyo Game Show" style. Find out what we had to say about it.
* Feelz Good & Godfree loves Saints Row 2.
* PaustinJ first press event experience. Make sure to be at least 21 years old or else!


All this and more! Enjoy the show.




The Podcast Awards finally announced this year's nominees for 2008. Gamertag Radio got nominated for "Best Mobile Phone Formated Podcast". Voting will open on October 23rd with voting closing November 6th at 2359. so we need your help for us to win this award! Head over to http://www.podcastawards.com & vote.

item.title: Episode #165 - Call Of Duty World At War Interview
item.description:
This week on Gamertag Radio:

* Daniel Suarez, Executive Producer of Call of Duty World at War for Activision as we discuss the reason why Treyarch decided to go back to WWII, what it was like using the COD 4 engine, gameplay, perks and more.
* David Vonderhaar, the Multiplayer & CoOp Gameplay Design Director for Activision as we discuss everything co-op and multiplayer related, including gameplay, spawn points, teamkilling and more!
* Dead Space review: Find out this could be one of the best games of the year.


all this and more only on GTR!

item.title: Episode #163 - Exclusive Podcast Interviews with Murs & Dan Hsu
item.description:
Pretty big show this week. Here's why:

* An exclusive interview with Hip Hop artist Murs about his new album "Murs For President" in stores now, he talks about the love of gaming, being featured on MTV, Gears Of War 2, and much more.

* We continue the exclusives! Former editor-in-chief of the video game magazine Electronic Gaming Monthly, EGM Dan Hsu joins us to discuss about his controversial blog post: Behind the Scenes: Gaming Journalism. Maybe this interview will bring more controversy. Enjoy this 50 min interview!

* Community spotlight interview with Anton B. Find out all the details about him winning 2nd place on the Madden Nation Challenge. Once again congrats Anton!


Enjoy the show and give us your feedback.
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #160 - Exclusive Podcast Interview with Dean Takahashi & Termanology
item.description:
Listen The show On any phone: (312) 224-2946
Voicemail: (206) 338-2708

It's so cold in the D! Are you one of the Xbox 360 owners that had a Red Ring Of Death experience? This week Dean Takahashi a well known journalist & blogger working for VentureBeat joins us for this EXCLUSIVE podcast interview to talk about his recent article "the Truth about the Xbox 360 Red Ring of Death". I wonder what Microsoft have to say about this article.

Also joining us Hip Hop rising star Termanology for an EXCLUSIVE podcast interview. He gave us the 411 about his new album called "Politics As Usual", working with legendary producer DJ Premier & old school gaming. Remember to buy his album in stores Sept. 30th!

All this & more only on GTR!

item.title: PAX08: The Power of Online Gaming Communities Panel
item.description:
Come listen and discuss just how important gaming communities are in today's world. Hear stories and ideas from some of the biggest communities on the internet and how they can help each other, influence the gaming world, and use strength in numbers to accomplish just about anything.

Speakers:

* Nicholas "bapenguin" Puleo (Evil Avatar.com, Co-Optimus.com)
* David "CheapyD" Abrams (CheapAssGamer.com)
* Christa "Trixie" Phillips (GamerCHIX)
* Flynn "Fruit Brute" DeMarco (GayGamer.net)


Moderated by:

* Nelson Rodriguez (Gamerscoreblog.com)

item.title: PAX08: Gamercast Network - Podcasting The New Media
item.description:
Podcast hosts from the Gamercast Network appearing at Penny Arcade Expo

Have a live roundtable discussion with podcasters from Gamercast Network. A podcaster from each show will discuss their experience with the shows and why podcasting is the new media.

Panelists include:

Jeromy Adams [Founder & Co-Host, Sarcastic Gamer]
Chad Hantak [Webmaster & Co-Host, Video Game Show]
Chris Paladino [Xbox Community Manager, Gamerscore Blog] - Moderator
Danny Pena (Godfree) [Founder & Co-Host, Gamertag Radio]
Natalie Sousa [Co-Host, Achievement Junkies]
Jay Van Beveren [Editor in Chief, Talking About Games]

item.title: Episode #158 - Mercenaries 2 Dev Team Interview

item.title: Episode #157 - Press Vs Community Roundtable
item.description:
Last week I was invited to the Mercenaries 2 Community Day event that took place in LA, California at Pandemic Studios. After the event, I recorded a "Press VS Community" roundtable discussion featuring Deaconblade from (U360), Trina (Gamingangels), Vicious (Talkingaboutgames) & Ryan (Marvel).

This year 2008 has been a big challenge not only for GTR but the community in general. Why gaming companies are changing by not working with indy sites? Are there too many gaming podcasts & blogs? Is this "community" gone too commercial? Are we community or press?

Listen to what we all had to say on this roundtable & let us know your feedback.
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #154 - Exclusive Podcast Interview With Netflix
item.description:
This week GTR brings you an exclusive interview with Steve Swasey the Vice President, Corporate Communications from Netflix. He talks about their new partnership with Microsoft for the Fall dashboard update. Also coming this fall is GTR Movie Nights hosted by Feelz Good & Baked Ant. Listen to this episode for all the details.

Also congrats to our friends at SFX360 for their 1 year anniversary event that took place this past weekend. Listen the interview with Ross the founder of the group on GTR live from the party.

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Statik Selektah - "To The Top" (Stick 2 The Script) featuring Cassidy, Saigon & Termanology

item.title: Gamercast Network E3 2008 Promo
item.description:
Don't miss Gamercast Network E3 2008 coverage. From July 14-17, 2008 live from LA, California. For more details head over to http://www.gamercastnetwork.com




Gamertag Radio & Mogulus Brings E3 To You Miami, FL - June 26, 2008: The hottest gaming podcast on the Internet, is proud to announce that it will be on site at E3 2008 from July 14th through July 17th, bringing you non-stop coverage on everything gaming. This year's E3 promises to be the biggest one yet.

In collaboration with online broadcasting platform Mogulus (www.mogulus.com), GTR will be the ultimate source for:

* Streaming coverage of E3 Press conferences
* Live coverage from the expo floor
* Dozens of interviews with game developers & community members
* Live chat with gamers around the world



About Gamertag Radio:
Gamertag Radio (http://www.gamertagradio.com) is an online radio show dedicated to the Xbox Live community and intended to help unite all online gamers. Over the past few years GTR has grown from a small website to one of the biggest & most respected gaming information sites on the Internet. Each week, a new episode is created recapping the news of the past week and includes discussions about what is happening in the online gaming community along with interviews and a weekly custom soundtrack highlighting up & coming Hip Hop artists. GTR also regularly reviews games, discusses new downloadable content and talks about new and upcoming releases, while attempting to shine some light on the Xbox Live Gamers themselves who contribute a lot to the gaming community.


About Mogulus:
Mogulus is a next-generation internet video platform combining Live, Linear and On-Demand broadcasting into a single embeddable player. Our technology gives you everything you need to launch your 24/7 Internet TV channel and provides a highly effective, easy to use TV studio, with the power to create live original programming, controlled by users, from any internet browser. Go to www.mogulus.com to create your own TV channel now!
item.author: godfree7@gmail.com

item.title: Episode #148 - Wideload Games Interview Hail To The Chimp
item.description:
What does animals and politics have in common? Wideload Games! This week they join us for an interview about their upcoming game "Hail To The Chimp" coming out for the Xbox 360 this month. Find out how they came up with this party game & working with Comedy Central. Also this week GTR staff invites the one & only Liquilife. He also performs his latest hit singles only on Gamertag Radio.

With the release of Ninja Gaiden II coming this week. The staff gets together and gave their review about the game & whats up with the slowdown during this fast-paced game? Find out what are our thoughts on Episode #148.

The staff would like to thank the following sponsor: Panasonic. They are advertising for the month of June. So please make sure to download our past shows to support the podcast. Enjoy and remember to post your feedback.

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Jadakiss - "From Now To Then (Feat. DJ Premier)

item.title: Episode #144 - NYC Roundtable & Guilty Gear Overture Interview
item.description:
GTR staff members Godfree & Design Jockey got to hang out with Theman661 (http://xcastonline.com) & Bambambpt from the GTR forums in New York City. The crew got to play some upcoming games for the Xbox 360: Legendary, Hail to the Chimp, Roogoo & Pirates vs. Ninjas Dodgeball. We got the chance to record a roundtable discussion about the games. Get to hear what all of us had to say & why Roogoo for the XBL Arcade is our favorite game.

Also this week GTR brings you an exclusive podcast interview with Aksys Games about their upcoming Xbox 360 game Guilty Gear Overture. Enjoy this week's podcast only on GTR!

Soundtrack of the week: Wrekonize feat Jean Grae "Unknown track"
& Heliocentrics f/MF Doom & Percee P "Distant Star"

item.title: Baggins FM WGTR - #1 Underground Hip Hop Radio Station In Liberty City
item.description:
LIBERY CITY, NY, April 28, 2008 - While the world eagerly awaits a chance to set foot in the criminal depths of Liberty City, Gamercast Network, a pioneer network in the community podcasting arena, is preparing an invasion of its own. As part of the Grand Theft Auto IV launch, Gamercast Network is pleased to announce the launch of Gamercast Network Pirate Radio, a new underground radio network for the residents, workers, and Waste Management Officials within Liberty City. Gamercast Network Pirate Radio is a free service provided by the member podcasts of the Gamercast Network, and can be found online at http://gta.gamercastnetwork.com

Gamercast Network Pirate Radio launches for Grand Theft Auto IV this Tuesday, April 29th, in conjunction with the launch of the retail game for the Xbox 360 and the PLAYSTATION 3. GNPR presents a new audio outlet for the scum and villainy of Liberty City, offering them their first alternative audio solution to the clutter of Grand Theft Auto IV's FM airwaves. Gamercast Network Pirate Radio consists of five unique shows, each dedicated to bringing a unique voice to Liberty City.

item.title: Episode #140 - Exclusive Podcast Interview With SpiderMonk About Roogoo (XBL Arcade)
item.description:
Have you ever had a dream about something then the next day you felt it was the greatest idea ever. That's what happened with Scott M. from Spidermonk Entertainment. He had a dream about little creatures and puzzle shapes. That's how his lastest project "Roogoo" came reality coming out for the Xbox Live Arcade sometime in April/May 2008. Scott gave us exclusive new details about Roogoo and what are his plans to promote the game. Also joining us during this interview is our good friend Rodsmack from 10K.com.

This past weekend GTR and the gaming community was part of The Ultimate LLS Guitar Hero Tournament charity event. Listen to our coverage live from The Inner Circle in Coral Springs, FL. Interviews with Kirby (top GH3 players), Jackye Clayton from Team in Training and the winner of the tournament Bradley Tenner. Enjoy the show & give us your feedback!


Please help & donate Jackye's charity:[/B] Team In Training Page
Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Ali Vegas - "Everyday Is War" & 9th Wonder/Buckshot "Hold it Down Ft. Talib Kweli"

item.title: Episode #137 - Exclusive Interview with DJ Irie From The Miami Heat
item.description:
This week the GTR crew brings you an exclusive podcast interview with DJ Irie from the Miami Heat during the Game With Fame event that took place this weekend. He gave us new info about his new album featuring Timbaland, J-Lo, Snoop, Jaime Foxx & more surprises. But that's not all. Find out the history on how he started DJing, about his new sneakers by Adidas & why he loves Halo 3.

Also joining us this week the staff members from The Gamers Garage part of the The Game Play Network. If you get the chance go support the indy podcasts!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Soul Street Symphony - "Gucci Girl"



Red Octane, GTR & SFX360 Sponsors GH III Tournament April 5th Fundraiser Event

Red Octane, The Inner Circle and LLS Presents The Ultimate LLS Guitar Hero Tournament, Saturday April 5th 2008 at The Inner Circle located at 2232 N. University Dr Coral Springs, FL (At University and Royal Palms Blvd. Behind Kinko’s)

This event will be hosted by members of the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society’s “Team in Training” . Red Octane is sponsoring the event as well as The South Florida Xbox 360 Meetup Group and Gamertag Radio.

item.title: Episode #136 - MLB2k8 Game Tour Coverage & Whats going on with the gaming community? Part 3
item.description:
This week the GTR staff podcasts live from the Major League Baseball® 2K8 Video Game Tour in Miami, FL and interviews one of the promoters of the event about the tour & game. Also what's going on with the gaming community? Once again we gave talked about issues going on & why gamers should take a break and help spread the word about the following charities:


Gaming4Others - Halo 3 Charity Tournament

Gaming4Others is pleased to announce the Help RagingJellyBean Finish the Fight Tournament, sponsored by the Femmes Fatales. "Beanie" is a gamer in need of a life-saving kidney transplant. Without insurance to help her she needs the funds to get her needed surgery and aftercare. We are honored to be helping RJB with this endeavor.



Red Octane, GTR & SFX360 Sponsors GH III Tournament April 5th Fundraiser Event

Red Octane, The Inner Circle and LLS Presents The Ultimate LLS Guitar Hero Tournament, Saturday April 5th 2008 at The Inner Circle located at 2232 N. University Dr Coral Springs, FL (At University and Royal Palms Blvd. Behind Kinko’s)

This event will be hosted by members of the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society’s “Team in Training” . Red Octane is sponsoring the event as well as The South Florida Xbox 360 Meetup Group and Gamertag Radio.

Click here for more information.

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Q-Tip "Midnight '08" produced by Cool & Dre

item.title: Episode #135 - Live from Community Vib3s (GTR 3rd year anniversary party)
item.description:
Miami, FL - The folks at Gamertag Radio enjoyed the sweet smell of success with their "Community Vibes" event. This interactive event drew more than 300 participants to Club PS14 on 23rd February, 2008. "Community Vibes" was the culmination of a three year effort by Gamertag Radio's staff members of running the show and the website [url]www.gamertagradio.com[/url]. The purpose of the event was to give gamers and non-gamers the opportunity to come together for a hip-hop and gaming extravaganza.

Incentives, such as prizes donated from Microsoft, EA, Sega, Tritton Technologies, and an Xbox 360 Elite as a prize courtesy of Microsoft, helped make the event come alive. DJ SharpSound's eclectic mix of hip hop and beats throughout the day constantly provided an upbeat tempo to the whole event.

To wrap up the daylong event local hip hop artists MayDay!, Wrekonize and P-Doe took the stage and gave an enthralling performance. For pictures and coverage of the event, head on over to [url]www.gamertagradio.com[/url] part of the Gamercast Network.


Pictures: Community Vib3s
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #132 - Pirates Vs. Ninjas Dodgeball Interview
item.description:
This week the staff are taking a nice break and getting ready for Community Vib3s. A few days ago, JVB, Ant & Godfree were invited to a local event called "Xbox 360 Meetup". At this event gamers meet and play LAN partys at Gamebreakers located in South Florida. The GTR staff interviews some of the members from the group about their history, favorite games & much more.

Also don't miss our interview with Chris Stockman, the studio director at Blazing Lizard about their Xbox Live Arcade game Pirates Vs. Ninjas Dodgeball. Only on GTR!

item.title: GTR3 - Community Vibes audio promo
item.description:
Gamertag Radio to Unleash Community Vib3s – Kicking Off 2008 With the Gaming Party of the Year

In celebration of its three year anniversary, Gamertag Radio will be hosting an event "Community Vib3s" at Club PS14 in Miami, Florida, on February 23rd, 2008. "Community Vib3s" brings to you a fusion of gaming and hip-hop, with performances from some of the hottest local acts. There will be hourly giveaways (including an Xbox 360 Elite courtesy of Microsoft), gaming sessions, musical performances, online and tournament play. Participation is absolutely free! Community Vib3s will be the gaming party of the year, and the year has just begun. This is an event not to be missed. The event will take place at PS14, downtown Miami's newest and hottest spots for after hours.

WHAT: "Community Vib3s"


WHEN: Saturday, February 23rd, 2008, 3:00pm-10:00pm

WHERE: Club PS14, 28 NE 14 St. Miami, FL 33132

WHO: GamertagRadio.com

COST TO ENTER: None

This event will mark the pinnacle of a 3 year long effort of the staff at Gamertag Radio. Gamertag Radio, where you always get the latest Xbox & Xbox 360 news, reviews, interviews and much more.
item.author: godfree@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #128 - CES 2008 & Xbox Account Hijackings Interview
item.description:
Welcome to the 4th season of GTR! This week staff member Peterocc gave us behind the scene coverage from CES 2008 (Las Vegas, NV). He let us know about Bill Gates last keynote, Warner Bros going Blu-Ray & more.

Also don't miss our interview with Artic from Team VBI about how his Xbox account getting stolen. Can this happen to others? Get to hear what he had to say about this situation.

Joining us this week: Godfree, Feelz Good, Cyber, Design & JVB. All this and more only on GTR!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week:
Bahamadia - "Spontaneity" & Breez Evahflowin and Dirt E. Dutch "Don't Be Afraid"

item.description:

item.title: Episode #122 - Kane & Lynch Community Day Roundtable
item.description:
Welcome to all new Zune listeners! Thanks for downloading GTR. This week the GTR staff invites Witchking from 2opgaming.com to talk about Call Of Duty 4 vs Halo 3, Mass Effect in stores early, leaks, & a review of Kane & Lynch.

Speaking of K&L we also bring you a roundtable live from Eidos Studios. Where community members gave their feedback about the single player & multiplyer game. You can watch a short video of the event at GTR Vision. Is it me or Feelz Good sounds like he has been possessed by a demon. Listen to the show & find out why... if you dare!

item.description:
Listen The show On any phone: (312) 224-2946
Voicemail: (206) 338-2708

This week before our coverage from the Kane & Lynch community event we bring you a new episode for GTR! A few weeks ago CyberAthlete & Godfree had the chance to interview the award-winning composer Jesper Kyd regarding his soundtracks for the upcoming titles The Club, Assassin's Creed and K&L. item.title: Episode #116 - Bizarre Creations Interview About Project Gotham Racing 4
item.description:
This week Bizarre Creations are releasing their last Project Gotham Racing game for the Xbox 360. The interview took place 2 days before their big annoucement: "Activision Acquires Bizarre Creations". Get to hear what they had to say about the game, PGR On Demand, new multiplayer features, new tracks, Geo Wars & more.

Also joining us this week Godfree, Feelz Good & JVB. They talked about what's going on since the launch of Halo 3, rumors about Bungie leaving Microsoft & what's up with bashing coming from Sony Defense Force blog.

We also got a call from our staff member CyberAthlete. He is calling from San Francisco, Cal and gave us a short recap about Activision's community event where gamers get to play and meet the developers of Guitar Hero 3 & Call Of Duty 4. All this & more only on GTR!

item.itunes:subtitle: Episode #116 - Bizarre Creations Interview About Project Gotham Racing 4
item.itunes:summary: This week Bizarre Creations are releasing their last Project Gotham Racing game for the Xbox 360. The interview took place 2 days before their big annoucement: "Activision Acquires Bizarre Creations". Get to hear what they had to say about the game, PGR On Demand, new multiplayer features, new tracks, Geo Wars & more. Also joining us this week Godfree, Feelz Good & JVB. They talked about what's going on since the launch of Halo 3, rumors about Bungie leaving Microsoft & what's up with bashing coming from Sony Defense Force blog. We also got a call from our staff member CyberAthlete. He is calling from San Francisco, Cal and gave us a short recap about Activision's community event where gamers get to play and meet the developers of Guitar Hero 3 & Call Of Duty 4. All this & more only on GTR!
item.itunes:keywords: Xbox 360, project gotham racing 4, Microsoft, Bizarre creations, video games, Halo 3, Bungie, Sony, PS3, Wii, Nintendo, Halo3, gamertagradio, gamertag radio, podcasting, podcast, games, gaming
item.itunes:author: Gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #115 - Halo 3 Midnight Launch Nationwide Coverage
item.description:
Where were you on Sept 25th? Halo fans from all over the world waited in line for hours just to be the first gamers to purchase the new Halo 3. In this audio you'll get to hear our nationwide launch coverage from the following cities: Miami, Seattle, Chicago, Orlando, & LA.

Also check out our exclusive 3hr video from Circuit City in Miami, FL @ GTR Vision. Enjoy!

item.title: Episode #114 - Halo 3 Impressions Roundtable

This game will change online gaming again just like how the last game did with Xbox Live. Listen what we had to say about the story, online co-op, multiplayer and why this game has the most feature we ever seen from any game. Enjoy...

item.title: Episode #113 - OXM Talks about Halo 3 & R.I.T Interview
item.description:
Before our big Halo 3 launch cover (Sept 24th - 25th) we bring you a new episode for all our listeners. This week Feelz Good talks about a "special package" that he'll be getting sometime this week. Find out what he had to say about. Here what we have for this episode:

Rochester Institute Of Technology Interview

Anna and Ana talk to Andy from R.I.T, about gaming development and the skills needed to one day create a game.

Interview with Francesca Reyes the editor-in-chief of OXM

Francesca is the first person in the world to play and finished the Halo 3 game a few weeks ago for their exclusive review on the next OXM issue coming out Sept 25th. In this interview she gave us some information about her experience playing the game, what the fans will think about the game, & more. No spoilers but be prepare for this 30min interview.

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week

Kanye West -"Good Night" Feat Most Def (Graduation Japanese Bonus Track)

item.title: WGC07: Podcasting During The Jaws Ride @ Universal Studios!
item.description:
We took a break from the WGC07 and went for some thrill rides at Universal Studios (Orlando, FL). I wanted to do something different and fun during our coverage. After thinking we came up with an idea to record live during The Jaws Ride with Deejayknight. This has to be the first time that we ever recorded a podcast at Universal Studios.

But one thing we noticed that the announcer of the boat ride was giving us hints to us that he is an Xbox 360 fan. By looking at us and screams "I ran out of adam!!".. Bioshock anyone??!?! Listen to the full audio and enjoy the ride!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #112 - Ea Studio Showcase & Turok Interview
item.description:
Turok Audio Interview With Propaganda Games
This week's show we are have an audio interview with Tim Lewinson, he is an associate director on Turok at Propaganda Games. This is his first time on a podcast but the interview came out pretty good. During the interview he talks about the differences with this new game and the older ones. He gave us some details on the multiplayer features, creatures in the game, weapons & much more. You don't want to miss this episode!

EA Studio Showcase Coverage
Peterocc the new staff for GTR gave us a full report on what he got to see at EA Studio Showcase. He has some audio interviews and behind the scenes news on what happen, plus feedback on the games he had the chance to play.

All this & more only on Gamertag Radio!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week:
-The B.U.M.S. - "Elevation (Free My Mind)" From 1994 *Classic Hip Hop*

-Peedo "Never Really Mattered" feat Garcia
You can check out my cousins website at http://www.myspace.com/peedo

-9th Wonder "Sunday" featuring Keisha Shontelle & Chaundon
Check out his site at http://www.myspace.com/9thwondermusic
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.description:
This week new interviews from PAX07 with Namco Bandai about their upcoming game Ace Combat® 6: Fires of Liberation™ & Sega's new Virutal Fighter 5 for the Xbox 360 which includes a new exclusive online mode for Xbox Live. But that's not all we discuss about our new GTR staff members, Halo 3 launch coverage & parties from all over the US, Penny Arcade Expo 2007 & much more.

Enjoy the new episode and stay tuned for more coverage coming this month from EA Studio Showcase, Halo 3 launch coverage, World Cyber Games in Orlando, FL & Digital Life 2007 live from New York City.

item.title: Episode #110 - MC Frontalot, Gamedaily & Bioshock
item.description:
Before taking the trip to PAX07. The GTR Staff brings you Ep. 110 featuring JVB from Podtacular.com. Here what we have for this week's show:

Gamedaily - GTR's E3 Sponsorship with EA
A few weeks ago a writer from Gamedaily wrote an article called "Most questionable media sponsorship - GTR". I sent him an email to see if we can discuss the topic for the show. Listen from both sides & why alot of people dosen't know the full story about our E3 coverage.

MC Frontalot Interview - Nerdcore Rising
The Godfather of Nerdcore Hip Hop MC Frontalot calls our show for a phone interview before his big performance at this year's Penny Arcade Expo 2007. He gave us a brief history about Nerdcore Rising, projects that he is working on, why he is the biggest nerd & more.

Bioshock Audio Review (Short Version)
Here is our short audio review of Bioshock for the Xbox 360 featuring Vicious from Uncle Gamer.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: GTR Vision: Bioshock Xbox 360 Video Review
item.description:
For the past few days ever since 2K Games surprised with the Bioshock demo. Everyone been talking about this masterpiece. Magazines & gaming sites are giving this game no lower then a 9.5 and even getting perfect reviews.

Could this be one of the best game we ever played? Vicious from Unclegamer.com & I been playing this game for a few days now. Today, finally had the chance to release this video review about the game. There isn't no spoilers during this review so you are safe to watch it. Get to hear what we had to say about the story, soundtrack, the level design & more on GTR Vision.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #109 - Freezepop Interview (PAX07 Countdown)
item.description:
A week before the Penny Arcade Expo 2007! Today GTR brings you a new episode featuring Godfree, Miss Irie, Dave Notti, Feelz Good & Anjo Banjo. Many of us had a discussion about the new Xbox 360 with HDMI Port. Is this a good or bad news for owners with the Xbox 360 Elite? What about those that doesn't own the console? Hear what the GTR staff had to say about this & other gaming news.

Liz from Freezepop feat Liquilife (Uncle Gamer)
We had the chance to interview Liz from the indie band Freezepop. You heard of them in many games such as FreQuency, Amplitude, Karaoke Revolution, Guitar Hero, Guitar Hero II, Flash Flash Revolution, and Downhill Domination, & Dance Dance Revolution. Liz gave us the history about the band & her thoughts on the music industry. In this interview features Liquilife from Uncle Gamer.

item.title: Episode #108 - Medal Of Honor Airborne Summit Roundtable
item.description:
Are you ready for war? Look at me on the banner giving you that "tough look". I had the chance to play some multiplayer action of Medal Of Honor Airborne for the Xbox 360. A few weeks ago EA invited gamers from both PC & Xbox 360 community to Fort Bragg, North Carolina the home of the 82nd Airborne. It was an amazing experience hanging out with the soldiers, touring at 82d Airborne Division War Memorial Museum, jumping a 34' tower & finally playing MOHA single & multiplayer.

After the event I got together with community members to have a roundtable discussion about the event & game featuring: Xbox365.com, Xboxcanadianlive.com, & Achievementjunkie.com. Give us your feedback at the forums.

item.title: Episode #105 - Transformers, Wing Commander & Band of Bugs
item.description:
This is our last show & we are planning to come back on July 10th Live from E3 2007!

Exclusive Podcast Interview - Wing Commander Arena
We had the chance to interview Sean Penney from EA about their new Xbox Live Arcade game "Wing Commander Arena". Get to hear why this game is different then other XBL Arcade titles and are you ready for a 16 player deathmatch online?

Band Of Bugs - Ninja Bee Interview
The guys from Ninja Bee returns with a new XBL Arcade game called Band Of Bugs. If you are a fan of games such as Advance Wars or Final Fantasy Tatics then give this game a try. We interviewed the developers about the game and also joining us is DC Crash from DC Radio!.

Exclusive Podcast Interview - Transformers The Game
The GTR staff invited Daniel Suarez, executive producer at Activision for Transformers: The Game. He talks about how the game is different from the movie, working with voice actor legends from the 80's cartoon, his favorite Transformer & more!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: - Funkdoobiest "Rock On RMX" & Shortie No Mas - "You Like My Style"
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #104 - NCAA 08, EGM Shoe & Forza 2 Interviews
item.description:
So what's Gamertag Radio big announcement? Can't reveal just yet but this week we bring you alot of great interviews:

Feelz Good - NCAA 08 Football Community day recap
GTR staff member Feelz Good gave his recap of last week's NCAA 08 Football Community day. Is this college football game better then last year? Get to hear what he had to say about it.

EGM Shoe from Electronic Gaming Monthly Interview
During his recent July '07 issue Dan Hsu wrote an editorial on how him & his staff don't accept no gifts, flights, hotels, etc from major video game companies but instead they pay it themselves. But what about indie sites? Should we do the same? Get to hear what he had to say about the gaming industry problem & why upcoming sites should be truthful with their fans.

Forza 2 Motorsport Interview
Davenotti had the chance to sit down with Che Chou community manager for Forza 2 motorsport from Turn 10. Get to hear what he had to say about the game & more.

item.title: Episode #103 - Pac-Man CE & Aaron Greenberg Interview
item.description:
Instead of wasting 75 mins bashing other community members to get attention. We at GTR bring you a POSITIVE podcast on one of the biggest video game icons in gaming history.

The new Pac-Man CE for the Xbox Live Arcade game just came out a few days ago. Aaron Greenberg claims this "major announcement" could make "gaming history". But we ask ourselves could this be true? While other major media sites (Joystiq , Kotaku & 1up.com) are saying that the Pac-man announcement it is part of gaming history. Listen to this episode & let us know what you think about it.

Our GTR staff Pinksage covers the Pac-Man event that took place in New York City. Also Godfree & Feelz Good interviews Aaron Greenberg from Microsoft. He talks about his statement, giving good or bad feedback to Microsoft, The Xbox MVP's & more.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #102 - The Xbox Boys, MOHA, Mad Tracks, Blue Skittle & Small Arms!
item.description:
We know that's alot of interviews for this week's show. Thanks to Miss Irie for the banner.

This week's host: Godfree, Feelz Good & Pinksage

Medal Of Honor Airborne @ EA With Patrick Gilmore
I had the chance to interview the Executive Producer of Medal Of Honor Airborne Patrick Gilmore during the MOHA summit at EA in LA.

Blue Skittle Magazine Interview
Our very own Pinksage & Ooopy created an online magazine with other Xbox community members called Blue Skittle. Get to hear how they came up with the idea & more.

The Xbox Boys - An Xbox rock band?
A few weeks ago I called one of the band members from The Xbox Boys. He gave us more information about the music group & why this is only for the Xbox. Also get to hear their new track called "Gears of War- "Why won't you die on insane?"

Mad Tracks Dev Interview
The developer of Mad Tracks Denis Bourdain from Load Inc called from France to give us more details about the game that came out for the Xbox Live Arcade last week. Remember to check out Pinksage's review.

World Exclusive Interview With Gastronaut Studios About Small Arms
Don & Jake from Gastronaut Studios are on this week's show to give us an Exclusive interview about their new downloadable content for Small Arms. Get to hear what they had to say about the price, details about the characters & level. Also are they going to work on more DLC for the game in the future?

item.title: Episode #101 - GSB Tour 07, Bomberman Live Interview & Podcasting 101
item.description:
Gamerscoreblog Tour Event Coverage Miami & Washington DC

Get to hear our live coverage from GSB Tour 2007. Feelz Good gives us a live report from Washington DC. Godfree sits down with Xbox community members in the Miami, FL at the event also a short interview with Microsoft's Tony Hynes & Cpaladino about the tour event that been going on all last week.

Exclusive Podcast Interview Bomberman Live (XBL Arcade)

Are you ready for the return of Bomberman? Were you disappointment with the last game? Then don't worry this game sounds like it will be taking it back to it's roots with the multiplayer game mode. Get to hear new details about the game with the Hudson Ent. Team. This game will be out for the Xbox Live Arcade later this Summer '07. Get to hear this Exclusive interview only at GTR!

Podcasting 101 feat Vicious (Uncle Gamer) & Nelson (AchievementJunkie)

Last week I had the chance to sit down with the following podcasters Vicious (Uncle Gamer) & Nelson (AchievementJunkie) about podcasting. This is a must listen for those that wants to know about creating a podcast, blog, community site, etc.. Get to hear what we had to say about the future of podcasting, how all of us started, dealing with PR, haters & more.

Also we reveal the winner of the Halo 3 Zune! Enjoy!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

This is a must listen for those that wants to know about creating a podcast, blog, community site, etc.. Get to hear what we had to say about the future of podcasting, how all of us started, dealing with PR, haters & more. Also we reveal the winner of the Halo 3 Zune! Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: Xbox 360, Microsoft, Halo 3, Gamerscoreblog, Forza 2, Gamertag Radio, Gamercast Network

item.title: Episode #100 - Gamertag Radio Staff Celebrates & Win A Halo 3 Zune!
item.description:
Gamertag Radio finally hits the 100th episode! After 2yrs of podcasting the staff celebrates with this amazing show. We start the show with a blast from the past on how the radio show started. Listen to when the Xbox Community heard Trixie for the first time, Xbox 360 launch with J Allard, Nano uncensored, bloopers, community interviews & much more! Also one of the biggest giveaway in GTR's history for the fans & 2 exclusive podcast interviews. Enjoy this episode and thanks to everyone that supports the show.

GTR Giveaways Winners (The biggest giveaway ever!!)
-Commander & Conquer 3 (5 copies)
-Capcom Lost Planet (3 copies)
-The Simpsons poster game signed by the Dev team from EA (2 copies)
-Tritton Headsets (2 headsets)

New Exclusive Podcast Interviews
-Sega Rally Revo - New details about the game!
-Penny Arcade - Pax07!

Voicemail Shout Outs
voicemail messages from EA, MS, GTR Fans, other podcasters, community members & more....

GTR Past Shows
Old interviews on this episode. The biggest highlights for GTR.... from J Allard, Peter Moore, De La Soul, Run DMC, KRS ONE, Dawn Wells, movie actor Danny Trejo, MLG, PMS Clan, Dean Takahashi, TeamXbox, Trixie, Major Nelson, MTV True Life, On10 & more...

To celebrate the release of our 100th episode. We are givingaway a free Halo 3 Zune (thanks Microsoft!) to one of our lucky listeners. All you have to do is give us your honest review about Episode #100. Make sure to download & listen to the show before posting. On next week's show (ep 101) we will be picking a random winner! Good luck!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #99 - TimeShift Exclusive Podcast Interview, Halo 3 beta, Wrekonize & KRS ONE Freestyle
item.description:
Happy Mother's Day! This week we have a very cool show for you fans out there. Lately I've been playing the Halo 3 beta multiplayer demo with Nano. Yesterday, we both sat down to record our impressions about the demo. We talked about the changes in the game, how different are the controls from Halo 2, the competition will get harder for pro-gamers next year for MLG & more. Our very own Pinksage was at the Halo 3 event in New York City. There was even a Halo 3 Zune! You can read her recap about the event at this link.

The other night I had the chance to meet with my good friend Wrekonize during the KRS ONE & Fat Joe concert in Miami, FL. He gave us more details about his new mixtape, his album coming out soon, when they are going to work on a new GTR intro & he can't wait to play Guitar Hero II for the Xbox 360. Speaking of KRS ONE have also drops a freestyle for this episode with a new track called "Hip Hop Lives" from his new upcoming album with Marley Marl in stores May 22, 2007.

Also don't miss our exclusive podcast interview with the producers of TimeShift from Sierra Games. They mention why this game isn't the same game from the OXM demo, multiplayer details, how the community can demand a collectors edition for this game & more. Dont miss our newest episode!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: Wrekonize - "My Way Out feat 8T8"
KRS ONE & Marley Marl - "Hip Hop Lives"

360FriendSpot.com Awards Nominates Gamertag Radio!


360friendspot.com are having their 1st Annual Awards & they nominated Gamertag Radio for "Best Community Podcast". Congrats to all the nominees. You can vote for us starting this Monday, May 14th 2007. Spread the word!

Thanks to the staff for nominating us! For more information head over to their site 360friendspot.com
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #98 - Street Trace NYC Community Event coverage
item.description:
The Street Trace: NYC community event took place yesterday at Gaia Industries. Many community members from the New York City were invited and they got to play Street Trace NYC before it comes out for the Xbox Live Arcade. The best part was meeting the developers at the event. It was really fun and hope to do more events like this in the future. Today we bring you a great coverage from the event. I sat down with Gaia Industries to discuss about the ST: NYC game, how they started to work on Wing Commander with EA, the future of XBL Arcade & much more. You'll also get to hear what other community members thought about the game.

I would like to thank Gaia Industries, TheXboxdomain.net, Mygamercard.net, Gamertagpics, Xbox MVPs, Gamercast Network, Xbox360fanboy.com, Lil Poison, etc... For posting about the event on their sites. Also a big shout out goes to the community members that came to support the event. Enjoy the coverage!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #97 - Capcom XBL Arcade Games Interview
item.description:
This week the Xbox 360 Elite finally out! Our very own Feelz Good had the chance to get one. What he had to say about the Elite? Is it worth the purchase? I know he won't change Miss Irie or Godfree's feeliings about the console. Today we have an interview with Robert Johnson from Capcom. He is the lead producer for the Xbox Live Arcade games:

Super Street Fighter® II Turbo HD Remix, Super Puzzle Fighter™ II HD Remix, Rocketmen: Axis of Evil and Talisman

Get to hear new details about these games & more! Enjoy this new episode.

item.title: Episode #95 - Boom Boom Rocket, Shadowrun & Team Hitman
item.description:
Finally our new show is up and ready for download. I recently moved to a new place so my internet will be down for a couple of days. Don't know if there will be a new show next week but in the mean time here what we have for Episode #95:

-Boom Boom Rocket interview:
We had the chance to interview Spencer Brooks from EA about their new XBL Arcade game "Boom Boom Rocket". In this interview you'll find out how the history about the game, why EA wanted to start working with Bizzare Creations, future DLC & more.

-Shadowrun Interview:
The Gamercastnetwork.com crew got together to interview Mitch Gitelman from Fasa Studios about Shadowrun. In here GCN asked some hard questions about the game. You don't want to miss this interview!

-Community Clan Interview: Team Hitman
Team Hitman clan member THM PETEROCC came to our Guitar Hero II party in Miami, FL. We sat down to talk about his clan site, his thoughts about Guitar Hero II, & more.

item.title: Episode #93 - Tritton Audio Xtreme 360 Interview (Fanboy Edition!!)
item.description:
The DRAMA continues!! Today GTR staff members Godfree, Miss Irie & Feelz Good gets together to discuss about the new Xbox 360 Elite. With the feedback going around in the community. We gave our thoughts about the new SKU from Microsoft. Also the crew had to answer a few negative comments about GTR. Listen what we have to say about the whole situation.

Also joining us Tim DiIullo from Tritton Technologies. He gave us more information about their new product Audio Xtreme 360 . This is one of the industry’s first high performance Dolby Digital and Pro Logic certified digital gaming headset for Xbox, Xbox 360, PS2, PS3, Mac/PC and DVD players. The AX360 provides true 5.1 digital, 360-degree surround sound with a detachable microphone. Check out what he had to say! All this & more only GTR!

item.title: Episode #91 - MVP Summit Coverage Part 2
item.description:
After sleeping at the airport thanks to last weekends snow storm I'm here to bring you our part 2 coverage from the MVP Summit. Alot of people been asking what's an MVP or how can I be part of this program? Well I had the chance to sit down with our Xbox MVP lead Tyler Welch from Microsoft. He gave us more information about the program that been going on for about 15 years.

Are forum posters important in the Xbox Community? Yes, They've been huge role in the community for years. They are the one giving us news, rumors, feedback & even coverage on events to other forum members. I have Witchking9 (From IGN boards) & Wiseguy (TeamXbox boards) for this week's show. They are also Xbox MVPs and don't have a blog, site or even a podcast. We had recorded a short audio on why they continue to post on forums then having an official site & how they had the chance to be part of the MVP program. Enjoy this week's episode & remember to post at our forums!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Part 2 coverage straight from Microsoft's MVP Summit 07!

item.title: Episode #90 - Xbox MVPs Roundtable & Skate Interview
item.description:
We are back with a new episode for GTR! This week I came to Seattle, WA for the MVP Summit 07. Here is more information about the global summit:

MVP Award recipients are invited to attend the MVP Global Summit, one of the largest multiday Microsoft MVP events. At the MVP Global Summit, MVPs receive access to exclusive technical content, participate in direct feedback sessions, and meet with Microsoft executives, product teams, and their peers from around the world.

So far we got to see alot of COOL stuff. We can't post anything but I decided to get some of the Xbox Mvps for a roundtable discussion about important topics going on in the community. Here are some pictures from the roundtable at: Dirty Diva's Flickr page.

Also we have a podcast exclusive interview with EA about their new game Skate coming for the Xbox 360 & PS3. Find out why this game is different then the Tony Hawk series, What the pro-skaters had to say about the game & more.... Give us your feedback at the forums.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #88 - 360Zine & Official Xbox 360 Magazine interviews
item.description:
This week we have the magazines episode! GTR invited both 360Zine & Official Xbox 360 Magazine to the show so they can give us the details on the history about the magazine, how the internet changed the industry, game reviews, Xbox community feedback & more. This week's episode we have GTR staff member's Miss Irie!
The GTR staff would like to thank Dave Taylor (360Zine) & Ryan McCaffrey (OXM) for the interview. It was fun interviewing them and remember to support these magazines!

Custom soundtrack of the week: The Listening
"Starships & Rockets" by Soul Street Symphony feat Klass E.

In search of the perfect emcee to fit his NY-centric beats, Miami
producer Rob Love looked toward Hip-Hop's Mecca and happened upon
Brooklyn's BK Cyph. At the same time, Cyph sought a beatsmith schooled
in the boom-bap era of the early to mid nineties to provide the backdrop
for his reflective raps. As fates ironic hand would have it, Rob Love
and BK Cyph formed Hip-Hops next big thing, the Soul Street Symphony.

item.title: Episode #87 -Def Jam Icon & PGL Live from from Otronicon v2.0 Interviews
item.description:
Happy 2nd year anniversary GTR! This week staff members Godfree & Nano gets together for a short discussion about the podcast. GTR's Best & worst moments! Why it took us 10 takes to record our first episode? We are planning to save the celebration for episode #100 which will be out later this year. For this week's show we have the founder of The Professional Gamers League of America. He gave us a brief history about the league, what he thinks of MLG & more.

Also the producer of Def Jam Icon Brian Hayes gave us the 411 about the game. What he thinks about Hip Hop & gaming, features, the soundtrack & more. Once again JVB from Podtacular.com is a special guest during this interview. Enjoy!!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy 2nd year anniversary GTR! Def Jam Icon & PGL Interviews
item.itunes:summary: Happy 2nd year anniversary GTR! This week staff members Godfree & Nano gets together for a short discussion about the podcast. GTR's Best & worst moments! Why it took us 10 takes to record our first episode? We are planning to save the celebration for episode #100 which will be out later this year. For this week's show we have the founder of The Professional Gamers League of America. He gave us a brief history about the league, what he thinks of MLG & more. Also the producer of Def Jam Icon Brian Hayes gave us the 411 about the game. What he thinks about Hip Hop & gaming, features, the soundtrack & more. Once again JVB from Podtacular.com is a special guest during this interview. Enjoy!!
item.itunes:keywords: xbox 360, microsoft, xbox, halo 2, halo 3, Def Jam Icon, video games, hip hop
item.itunes:author: Gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #86 - Virtual Tennis 3 & Xbox Rewards Interviews
item.description:
* This week after a few delays we are back with a new episode! Today staff members Pinksage, Feelz Good & Godfree are hosting Ep #86. We talked about GTR's Birthday and how we need your help to come up with an idea for next weeks show. The winner will get a free game. Sega joins us for an interview about their upcoming game Virtual Tennis 3. If you're a fan of the game since the old Dreamcast then don't miss this interview! I think this could be more fun with online play, extra new features such as VTtv & more . They gave us the whole scoop about it and wants to battle the GTR staff for some multiplayer action. Sega vs GTR (coming soon)! This interview features Nano 551.

Also Mo Lam the Global Product Manager from Microsoft of the Xbox Rewards. He joins us and wants the community to know more about their new program. During this interview JVB from Podtacular.com came to help us out and asked a couple of questions. I know some of you are happy that we can finally win some cool prizes for just unlocking achievements on the Xbox 360!

Pinksage wants all our listeners to give us some *Hugs* for Valentines Day. Specially Feelz Good since he will be all alone playing some old Xbox games. So any females out there reply to this thread with *Hugs* to show him some love.

This week giveaway winners: I Kage I thank you for diggin our podcast! For that you get a free copy of NBA Street Homecourt (Xbox 360) & Spartan 5O wins a free copy of Virtual Tennis 3. Thank you for being active on our GTR forums. Please give us your addy asap and thank you to EA & Sega for the games.


Custom Soundtrack of the week: Teriyaki Boyz ft Kanye West - I Still Love H.E.R.

TERIYAKI BOYZ is a j-hip hop group from Yokohama, Japan. Their first CD from Def Jam Recordings/BAPE Sounds entitled BEEF or CHICKEN? was produced by a who's who of rap/electronica producers including Daft Punk, Adrock, DJ Premier, DJ Shadow and Cornelius.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Bonus Audio: Crackdown - Community roundtable discussion
item.description:
Today we are releasing this roundtable discussion with Xbox community members that got invited to a special event at Microsoft HQ at Redmond, WA. You'll get to hear JVB (Podtacular), Vicious (Uncle Gamer), Nelson (PlanetXbox360) & your host asking all the questions Godfree (Gamertag Radio). They gave us their final review on Crackdown for the Xbox 360.

They been playing this game for a week and they got all the scoop about the features, weapons, gameplay & much more. Enjoy this audio and let us know your thoughts at our forums.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #85 - Snoop Dogg, Johnny Damon, Eric V (Baka Boyz), Bullet Witch & Worms interviews!
item.description:
This past weekend during the Super Bowl here in Miami, Fl. There were many events and one of them had to do with gaming. Snoop Dogg & Johnny Damon (NY Yankees) battle it out on Madden 07 (Xbox 360) for charity. We have exclusive audio interviews from the event with Johnny Damon, Eric V (Baka Boyz) & Snoop Dogg talking about the event.

But that's not all we interviewed Martyn Brown from Team17. He gave us new details about Worms coming out for the Xbox Live Arcade. He talked about the game features, downloadable content, online gameplay, & what he thinks about XBL Arcade. We continue with our final interview with Atari staff members about Bullet Witch gaming coming out this month. Enjoy this very cool episode and give us your feedback at the forums!

This week Soulfizzy wins a copy of NBA Street Homecourt for the Xbox 360! Congrats!

Custom Soundtrack Of The Week: DJ Jazzy Jeff "My Souls" feat Raheem

DJ Jazzy Jeff (born Jeffrey A. Townes on January 22, 1965 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania) is an African American hip hop/R&B record producer. He is best known for his early career with Will Smith as half of DJ Jazzy Jeff & the Fresh Prince.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #84 -Command & Conquer 3 and NBA Street Homecourt Interviews.
item.description:
We are back with more interviews! Can you believe our 2nd year anniversary is coming next month? To celebrate during the month of Feb 07. There will be surprises, giveaways & more interviews! In this new episode we have GTR's new staff member Feelz Good joining us this week along with Godfree & Nano. Are you ready for the new Command & Conquer 3 coming for the Xbox 360 this spring? We invited the dev team to our show so they can give us more information about the game, monthly podcast & community blog. Also more details about NBA Street Homecourt. Find out during an interview with the online producer of the game!

Our first weekly winner for our "Digg Our podcast contest" is Col Hartman. Also we decided to giveaway a surprise to one of our forum members with a free copy of Virtual Tennis 3. Who could it be???

item.title: Episode #81 - CES 07, Guitar Hero II & Grandma Hardcore!
item.description:
What's the best way to start with a big bang for 2007? With our new episode for GTR! In this 3rd season for the podcast we have our very own Miss Irie at CES 07 with some behind the scenes news, thoughts of her being at the Bill Gates keynote & more. But that's not all! The staff had the chance to interview Red Octane. Hopefully they can give us all the juicy info on the new Guitar Hero II for the Xbox 360. Btw Nano swears that he will be a rockstar after this game releases this year. We also want to thank Grandma Hardcore & her grandson Timothy for being part on this weeks episode. All of us had a great time interviewing Grandma! Remember to visit her blog at Oghc.blogspot.com

Remember to be part of our new "Digg Our Podcast" contest to win a free Windows Vista Launch Kit!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Xbox Community Awards 2006
item.description:
The 2nd Annual XCA '06 is finally out! We invited many special guests for the awards celebration featuring Peter Moore, Major Nelson, Trixie, Frankie (Bungie), Aaron Greenberg & many more. To all nominees we want to thank you for making this community special. All of us are doing this out of love. Many indie blogs, podcasts, news sites, etc.. made a huge impact this year more then ever. The reason the GTR staff created these awards is to give those members recognition for all the hard work. Doesn't matter if you win or not.

Enjoy these awards and please give us your feedback. Hopefully we can continue to do this next year!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #80 - Actor Danny Trejo & Novadrome Dev Interviews
item.description:
This week GTR brings you a new episode before the 2nd Xbox Community Awards 06. In episode #80 we have an interview with the movie actor Danny Trejo. He has been in many movies such as Heat, Spy Kids, Dusk Til Dawn, & many more. But you might have heard his voice in these video games: Grand Theft Audio Vice City, Def Jam Fight For NY & the new GTA for PSP. He talks about his favorite video game character, lastest projects & more.

Also the developers Stainless Games from the upcoming XBL Arcade game Novadrome joins us to give the community more information about this game coming out very soon this Holiday 2006. Enjoy this episode feat Liquilife from Unclegamer.com.

You might hear some of the audio cutting off due to the software. During our last night recording some of the audio didn't record & I tried my best to edit the show. This episode is an hour long! Sorry and enjoy the show..
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #79 - Nexgenwars.com Interview & Retro Xbox Coverage from 2001
item.description:
We're back! But this time it's war! Yes the console wars continues with the launch of the Ps3 & The Wii. But how that's going to effect the Xbox 360 sales? We sat down with the owner of Nexgenwars.com to talk about his site and the sales of each console. How he gets all the information? Is the sale numbers accurate? What others had to say about his site? Listen to the interview to find out. Also a blast from the past audio coverage from 2001. When both consoles Xbox & Gamecube launched back 5yrs ago. What gamers had to say about last generation console war & a behind the scenes audio the making of the orginal Xbox.

The GTR staff welcomes our original member Nano. He is back! Stronger then ever! All this & more only on Gamertag Radio.
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #78 - Lost Planet & Small Arms Dev Interviews
item.description: Xbox community members were invited to be the first in the world to play Capcom's newest game "Lost Planet" at Microsoft campus. We had the chance to interview the Capcom team about the game in this new audio from the summit featuring DeaconBlade 360, Coola, & CPaladino & Fragmaster B also joins us to check out Small Arms and sat down with the developers for this exclusive roundtable audio interview. I also added the game's music theme song! Enjoy!
