item.title: Episode #77 - Superman Returns & Medal Of Honor Interviews
item.description:
In this week's episode we have 2 great interviews! As you can see both are from EA's new upcoming games for the Xbox 360. Our first interview with Jeff Peters he is the Supervising Producer of Superman Returns the video game. Jeff gave us more details about the game, a new demo coming to the Xbox Live marketplace, and more. This week Cyberathlete was invited to the Medal Of Honor Airborne community event and has over 7hrs of audio coverage. Slowly we are going to be releasing the audios to our fans. These are the developers giving us all the scoop about the game coming out in 2007! Check out part 1 in this audio! Thank Ea's Blackhat for help.

BamBeatz joins us with an exclusive track featuring the Hip Hop legend KRS ONE. He gave us the story on how they got together. Nano claims that there's cheaters on the GTR arcade leaderboards and more only on GTR!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Bonus Audio: Gears Of War - Match Made In Hell Audio Report
item.description:
Gamers from New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, and San Francisco were the first to play Gears of War after special pre-release screenings of The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning. Our staff members Pinksage & Dave Notti got to check out the screening in New York City & Cyber went to Chicago area.

So far Cyber gave us a quick report from the event and later this week we will have on the site an exclusive video interview with the president of Epic Game Mike Capps. Enjoy this short audio report!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Bonus Audio: Gears Of War - Match Made In Hell Audio Report

item.title: Episode #73 - Zune Interview & Wii Ambassador Event
item.description:
This week we come back with a very cool episode. First of all after two car accidents back to back Nano & Bam Beatz joins us for our feedback about the Wii Ambassador Event that took place in Miami, FL. What were their thoughts about the games, the control & is it worth the purchase?

Also in this episode we invited Cesar Mendez from Microsoft's Zune team. We sat down to talk about the new mp3 player, Xbox 360, his blog, unsigned music artists and much more. Next week catch us live from Digital Life (NYC) for the lastest coverage from the event!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #72 - Tribe Called Quest & Joystiq Interviews
item.description:
This week we have an amazing show with 2 podcast exclusive interviews! First we start of with the Hip Hop legendary group Tribe Called Quest. They are on tour with 2k Sports and also part of the soundtrack from the game NBA 2K7. We had the chance to interview one of the members of the group Phife Dawg. He talked about the music scene, NBA 2k7, and about the group.

After we continue with a great interview with Vlad Cole from Joystiq.com and so far this could be one of our favorite interviews! Both Pinksage & myself came up with some good questions about the history of Joystiq, what bloggers should do to have a great blog, the console war, PR versus the upcoming sites, TGS and much more.

Dont miss this show! Only on GTR..
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #71 - Saints Row Dev Interview
item.description: Welcome to the first GTR & Gamercast Network show! Today we are back with a very cool interview with community member PG4 from Xbstream.com. Now you can listen to our show on your Xbox 360! So check out this interview. Also we finally got to talk with the developers Volition Inc about their new game Saints Row. When the patch will be coming to fix the online lag, what they had to say about Grand Theft Auto, the game's soundtrack & much more! Only at GTR!

item.title: Episode #70 - Viva Pinata Interview
item.description:
We are back with a new episode this week. The Gamertag Radio staff and our guest Steve from XBLRadio.com had the chance to have a roundtable discussion on Sony Online verse Xbox Live. What are our thoughts about the PS3 news & Viva Pinata is it worth or not to buy it this holiday season.

Listen to our Viva Pinata interview with Microsoft. They gave us a sneak preview of the game and more only on GTR!

Thanks to Steve for helping out with the recording.

item.title: Episode #69 - Gastronaut Studios Interview (Small Arms)
item.description:
How was your Labor day weekend? Well for us it was more work. This time we have a podcast exclusive interview with Gastronaut Studios the developers of Small Arms for the Xbox live Arcade. This game been getting alot of attention from the Xbox community and we finally get some more details about the game. Could this be the next Smash Bros for the Xbox 360? Small Arms is more like a deathmatch game so get ready for some battles! The GTR staff can't wait to finally get this game later on this year.

I hope we can get that "Viral" achievement from the developers of the game. Hey Don or Jake hook us up! During this episode we gave our review of Saints Row, plus thoughts from the staff on HD DVD vs Blu-Ray and more only on Gamertag Radio.

item.title: Episode #68 - MLG Orlando, FL 2006
item.description:
We are back with a podcast exclusive episode! Live from MLG Orlando 2006. In this week's show we interviewed a few players that are part of this tournament & the gave us their experience for this season. Some people came to the GTR mini studio to be part of our show. Dawn Wells - Mary Ann Summers from Gilligan's Island, Tsquared, KSI Sirens, Lil Poison & Sick Vic, MoB clan, Foomo Jive Podtacular.com, Team X-Rated and much more!

item.title: Episode #67 - Activision, THQ & 2K Sports Interviews!
item.description:
Last night was a mission to record this episode.. But we are back with 3 big interviews! Nano came to talk about MLG Orlando that will take place this weekend in FL. Hope his team can make it to the finals (good luck). Today we finish our coverage from Microsoft Games Unwrapped event. Activision gave us a preview of Call Of Duty 3 coming for the Xbox 360. THQ short interview about their new game WWE Raw vs Smackdown 2007. But that's not all we finish this episode with a Podcast Exclusive interview with 2K Sports! They gave us a few new details about NBA 2K7, the soundtrack feat Tribe Called Quest, will we ever see NFL 2K again, Shaq on the cover of the game & much more.

Thanks to Pinksage, Cyber, Nano and everyone else that were part of this show.

item.title: Episode #66 - Lucas Arts & Activision interviews
item.description:
The results are in! Gamertag Radio didn't win the awards. But that doesn't stop us by creating a whole new episode. This week we have for the first time ever the whole GTR staff: Miss Irie, Pinksage, Cyber, Davenotti (new staff) and myself on the same show. We gave our reactions with the Podcast awards results, feedback on Capcom's new games Street Fighter 2 for the Xbox Live Arcade (not very new) & Dead Rising for the Xbox 360.

Pinksage topic of the week: XNA Game Studio Express - now you can create your own games for the Xbox 360. What are our thoughts about it. Also interviews with Lucas Arts about Lego StarWars 2 & Activision giving us more details about their new game Tony Hawk Project 8. Only on GTR!! Enjoy!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #65 - Atari, Ubisoft & Sega Interviews
item.description:
GTR continue's with our coverage from Microsoft Games Unwrapped (NYC). This weeks show we have 3 big interviews! We start with Atari interview. They break down the new car racing game Test Drive Unlimited for the Xbox 360. If you played the demo from E3 then check out this interview a get ready for some new information about the game.

Ubisoft joins us with a nice demo of Splinter Cell Double Agent. They explain the story and what's new with Sam Fisher. Now for a bonus we got the chance to talk with Ben Harrison from Sega. He breaks down the return of Sonic The Hedgehog for the Xbox 360.

Custom soundtrack of the week: DJ Shadow - Backstage Girl (Feat. Phonte)

Remember to vote for us at the Podcast Awards!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

item.title: Episode #64 - MIcrosoft Games Unwrapped coverage
item.description:
Back with a new 2nd special episode live from Microsoft Games Unwrapped (NYC). We start it off with my good friends at Thegamingnoise.com Chip & Zach. They read my email that I sent to some podcasters from the gaming community. Just want other podcast shows to stop bashing others. Let them post whatever they want and say how much we suck! We at GTR are just traveling and working hard getting interviews. In better word MAKING MOVES not wasting time.

In today's show we have GTR staff members Pinksage, DaveNotti and myself (Godfree) with a roundtable discussion live from the event to discuss the games we played and more. Also interviews with Epic Game's Cliffy B about Gears Of War & Rey Jimenez from Capcom to talk about Dead Rising.

Remember to vote for us at the Podcast Awards!

item.title: Episode #63 - Aaron Greenberg & Madden EA Interview
item.description:
So today we release a nice audio interview episode with Aaron Greenbreg (Xbox Live Arcade manager). He gave us new information about the new update for some old Xbox Live Arcade games that you can use with Xbox Live Vision! This will happen on launch day of the camera Sept 19, 2006. Just listen to the interview for more information. Also EA Sports interview about the Madden 07 for the Xbox 360. Enjoy..

Remember to vote for us at the Podcast Awards!
item.author: tips@gamertagradio.com

This will happen on launch day of the camera Sept 19, 2006. Just listen to the interview for more information. Also EA Sports interview about the Madden 07 for the Xbox 360. Enjoy..

item.title: Episode #62 -XBL Arcade & Podcast awards nomination party!
item.description:
GTR community celebrated the podcast awards nomination by having a nice Xbox Live Arcade party. We had many people from the Hip Hop & gaming community into one place. Playing UNO, Geo Wars, Zuma and more. Later that night we had the chance to play other 360 games such as Fight Night, Fifa, NBA Live, Prey & taking it back with Halo 2.

Check out this audio party and remember to vote for Gamertag Radio at the Podcastawards.com

item.title: Episode #61 - Garcia & Ninja Bee Interview
item.description:
This week we are getting ready for our Xbox Live Arcade Party! But before our crazy party we had to bring you a brand new episode. In this week's show we have Miami's own Garcia. He is a well known MC from 305. What he had to say about his new album, commercial radio and more.

Steve Taylor from NinjaBee joins us. His staff are the makers of the new Xbox Live Arcade game Cloning Clyde. Enjoy the new episode and stay tuned for our new special show next week live from the party!

Custom soundtrack of the week:
-Garcia "Confessions of a Sellout"
-J Dilla "Won't Do"

item.title: Episode #60 - Penny Arcade Interview
item.description:
After not having no sleep for 24 hrs we are back with a new episode. First of all thanks to all our listeners for nominating us at the Podcast Awards. This week guest we invited Penny Arcade staff members Jerry Holkins and Mike Krahulik. How did they started this webcomic? Plus more information about PAX and about their charity site Child's Play.

Bam Beatz had the chance to try out NCAA 07 demo for the Xbox 360. What he had to say about his favorite football game? Enjoy episode #60 the "Ebonics Edition"!

Custom Soundtrack of the week: Garcia - The Countdown
